pageTitle: Mavic Sprint Jacket - Men's | Competitive Cyclist
title: Mavic Men's Cycling Apparel
textBeforeTable: Men's Cycling Apparel Mavic Size chart cycling Recommended Use: 1 chest Pockets: no Hood: slim Fit: fully taped Seams: 9000 mm Fabric Waterproof Rating: Air Mesh Material: Tech Specs The Mavic Sprint Jacket is available in sizes Small to XXX-Large and in the color Black. For a complete closure, the jacket features a full-length zip lets, and for storage of your ride essentials, Mavic also included one chest pockets along with a large rear pocket. In terms of fit, though, the Sprint H2O's anatomic design continues the aforementioned waterproof characteristics. By this, we mean that Mavic's incorporation of its Ergo Cuffs guarantees a stop to water seepage at the sleeve, while the cut itself adapts to the body in order to prevent
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg. Sleeve: Measure from the center of your back to your wrist with arms held out.
